name: Naruto Shippuden Sasuke Uchiha Summon of Susanoo HQS 1/8 Statue 45cm (Displayed)
description:
Naruto Shippudens statue of Sasuke Uchiha, 1/8 scale size approx.45cm. Official product in limited edition by Tsume

Naruto Shippudens fans have been waiting for him since the start, Sasuke Uchiha HQS by Tsume stages the most anticipated fights of the show among them, the Uchiha brothers facing Orochimarus disciple, Kabuto Yakushi! Start or complete your collection with this unique piece as dynamic as it is full of nuances.

 Inspired by different scenes of the show, this statue features the heir of the Uchiha clan in a counter stance. Standing behind him the massive Susanoo jutsu, ready to fire a chakra arrow charged with Amaterasu.The titan, fully casted in clear resin, displays variations of purple and uses contrast to mimic the chakras visual effect. The flames on its base were the biggest challenge. The second challenge was to keep this piece within reasonable size so it would be easily displayed in showcases.

 Sasuke is fully in extension, the sword drawn out and ready to delivera lethal blow to his opponent. Hes coming with two alternate heads : the first one features both eyes with the Eternal Mangekyō Sharingan, and blood trail related to the use of the Amaterasu jutsu. The second head features one eye with the Eternal Mangekyō Sharingan and the second one with the Rinnegan inherited from the Sage of the Six Paths.

This piece of art is already great in standalone, but it becomes absolutely fabulous displayed in duet with our previous statue, Itachi Uchiha HQSby Tsume.

 

Limited to 2500 pieces wordwide.

Characteristics:

Artistic direction: Saesa Kiyokawa, Cyril Marchiol

Concept art: Ivan Elfried Bussam Bu Kumn, Saesa Kiyokawa, Patrick Tran

3D sculptor: Olivier Sam, Patrick Tran

Technical engineering: Muhammet Ay, Jose Ku Chio Lu

Preparation: Tom Fargnier, Guillaume Hemery, Eric Jolivalt, Aude PastorPainting: Mickael Gros, Guillaume Hemery, Aude PastorMaterials: Polyrésine, PU, PVC, ABS, aimants

Size: H : 33 cm / D : 47cm / W : 45 cm
